page.title: 11WOODLAND Melton Ross Croxton
page.content:
Forestry Information, Melton Ross CP and Croxton CP. (Civil Parish ) Ref 1306 TRIANGLAR WOOD. 70 % Broadleaves Oak,Ash,Beech, Sycamore. 30 % Softwood Scots +Corsican Pine Age 30 years European Larch.
Ref 1307 LONG CLOSE & CROXTON PLANTATIONS AND TOP FARM WOOD. 80 % Broadleaves Ash,Sycamore,Oak, Beech & Elm. 20 % Softwood Scots +Corsican Pine Av. Age 50 years European Larch.
Ref 1206 MELTON HIGH WOOD. 80 % Broadleaves Beech,Oak, Sycamore and Ash. 20 % Softwood European Larch, Scots + Corsi.pines. Age 80 years + Mature stand of Beech at Melton High Wood,over 150 yrs old.
